summary: The Infinity Blade Sword from the ios game
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]6dBBAsnKp-A[/youtube]

Uploaded version with both 1h and 2h craftable ingame both named infinity blade. The more silvery one is the 1h. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1handed version is uploaded. I changed the cubemap for reflections to quicksilver making it a more silvery hue than the 2h version. Enjoy! :)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello everyone, this here is the Infinity Blade Sword from the popular iphone games. It is craftable under daedric category and enchantable. For now it is 2h will add 1h version later. The textures took me two whole days and since I am not a texture artist dont expect a better retexture from me. 

My mods:
Hidans Scythe - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16401
Infinity Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17255
Legion Helmet - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18341
Phoenix Katana - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16935
Stormfang Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18494
Grayson Sword - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17552
Zabuzas Executioner Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16753
author: siberok92
